mapper.select: select * from source where course_id = #{courseId} and uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: insert into source (source_id, source_name, source_type, source_upload_time, source_path, course_id, uid) values (#{sourceId}, #{sourceName}, #{sourceType}, #{sourceUploadTime}, #{sourcePath}, #{courseId}, #{uid})
mapper.update: update source set source_name=#{sourceName}, source_type=#{sourceType}, source_upload_time=#{sourceUploadTime}, source_path=#{sourcePath} where source_id=#{sourceId}
